[Home](./index.md) &gt; [forms42core](./forms42core.md) &gt; [Block](./forms42core.block.md) &gt; [getQBEPropertiesById](./forms42core.block.getqbepropertiesbyid.md)

## Block.getQBEPropertiesById() method

As in getQBEProperties, but narrow down on the field id

**Signature:**

```typescript
getQBEPropertiesById(field: string, id: string): FieldProperties;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string | The name of the field to retrieve QBE properties for. |
|  id | string | The ID of the field to narrow down the search. |

**Returns:**

[FieldProperties](./forms42core.fieldproperties.md)

The properties used in QBE mode for the specified field ID, or `null` if not found.
